com.java.controller.startup

Class StartUpPhaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.controller.startup.StartUpPhaseTest

  • public class StartUpPhaseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    StartUpPhaseTest class tests the important aspects of start up phase, for instance: player generation, random country assigment to players, the number of initial army based on number of players and generate round robin.
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Cristian Rodriguez

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StartUpPhaseTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignCountriesToPlayers()
      Random assignation is tested by comparing if one country belongs to only one player.
      static void beforeEverything()
      Game data and a dummy map is created in order to test the methods which use this data.
      void generatePlayers()
      Test the player generation by testing if the ids are given in a right way.
      void generateRoundRobin()
      Round robin generation is tested by comparing the order of play of each player.
      void initialArmyCalculation()
      The initial number of army is given by a factor based on the number of countries.
      void initialArmyCalculationForMoreThan126Countries()
      The initial number of army is given by a factor based on the number of countries.
      void initialArmyCalculationForMoreThan84Countries()
      The initial number of army is given by a factor based on the number of countries.
